OOC: Good luck.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
=
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, July 12, 2001 1:46 AM
  Sub=
ject: Vacation (kinda)


  Well, tomorrow I'm leaving for Defcon, a hacker =
conference in Las Vegas that's gonna last the whole weekend. I really doubt=
 I'll have time to post, though I will have internet access so I might drop=
 in for a little while. I've been preparing my laptop for a hacker war, wis=
h me luck :-)





  Anyways, I'll split my chars among people a bit. Here'=
s who gets who until Monday (if its ok with them to control those bots till=
 then).





  Robo - Cledar, Rixer, Forrior, Blyer, Firearm (have them go =
to the battle to help the Chivtrons. Here's your chance to make HotRod look=
 competent for a change) :-)





  Hedge - DevilDuer (don't make him act _=
too_ stupid).





  Gunthers - Dion





  Megan - Prowl, Cyndro.








=
  That'll go into effect tomorrow. I'm not sure if I can post today, but I'=
ll try.

com/info/terms/
